best.among: all of the state - of - the - art methods

performs.from sentence:
Comparison with existing approaches 4.1.1 Evaluation on 300W
Our method performs best among all of the state - of - the - art methods .

WFLW.from sentence:
Evaluation on WFLW
Though reasonable performance is obtained , there is illustrated to be still a lot of room for improvement for the extreme diversity of samples on WFLW , e.g. , large pose , exaggerated expressions and heavy occlusion .

significantly reduced.from sentence: The failure rate is significantly reduced by 3.75 % , which indicates the robustness of our method to handle occlusions .

boundary information.from sentence: Moreover , our method uses boundary information achieves 29 % , 32 % and 29 % relative performance improve- ment over the baseline method ( " LAB without boundary " ) on COFW - 29 , AFLW - Full and AFLW - Frontal respectively .

4.62 % mean error.from sentence: We achieve 4.62 % mean error with 2.17 % failure rate .
